## RoleSettings type


**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RoleSettings = {
    type: "use_existing";
    value: {
        cell_id: CellId;
    };
} | {
    type: "provisioned";
    value: {
        membrane_proof?: MembraneProof;
        modifiers?: DnaModifiersOpt;
    };
};
```
